listChange.change: Used custom XML data to generate three TEI files: authors_3.0.xml, booksRead_3.0.xml, and readings_3.0.xml.
Up-converted custom XML into a version with keyed entities: booksI'veRead_2.1.xml.
Up-converted TEI into a custom XML file booksI'veRead_2.0.xml. Began augmenting data and cleaning up transformation errors.
Using OxGarage, converted ODT document into TEI.
Last known revision of the ODT document.
Created Books I've Read 2.0 (start Mar. 2008).odt in OpenOffice.
